title: Add missing long error code explanations

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: metabug
labels.description: Issues about issues themselves ("bugs about bugs")

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-help-wanted
labels.description: Call for participation: Help is requested to fix this issue.

labels.name: A-docs
labels.description: Area: documentation for any part of the project, including the compiler, standard library, and tools

labels.name: D-newcomer-roadblock
labels.description: Confusing diagnostic error hard to understand for new users

body:
This is a re-opening of #32777.

## Explanations

Those error codes and their explanations are declared in files named `error_codes.rs`. In those files, you can see generally two macros: `register_diagnostics` and `register_long_diagnostics`. If an error code is in `register_diagnostics`, it means it lacks long error explanation. The goal of this issue is to add those missing explanations!

This is an easy first issue but don't hesitate to ask for help if you're stuck on something!

Here is the list of **all** error codes that don't have a long error explanation yet:

 * [x] E0183 (#89885)
 * [x] E0203 (#66880)
 * [x] E0208 (#98011)
 * [x] E0212
 * [x] E0224
